title: Incorrect enablement of "Build" popup action
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior seems incorrect and redundant.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench, as there is no need for a manual build if the build is already performed automatically.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective.
5. Observe that the "Build" action is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
